dmca.title: Google DMCA - YouABC
dmca.body:
ATTN: Google, Inc.
Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA, 94043, USA
Fax: (650) 963-3255

FROM: Flora Niu
Youabc.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 508, Yu Yuan Mansion,
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan,
Xi'an, Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.
Tel: (86-29) 8523 6688 Ext. 207
Fax: (86-29) 8539 7349
E-mail: dmca@youabc.com

SUBJ: Copyright infringement
PAGE; 2
DATE: November 21, 2006

Dear Google, Inc.

I, the webmaster of www.youabc.com, am on behalf of our company, Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.. I am looking forward for your concerns about the website hotel.roadtripchina.net which copied all our copyrighted pages.

The whole content of hotel.roadtripchina.net had copied from youabc.com without authorization. All of the pictures on hotel.roadtripchina.net contain the watermark of 'YOUabc', some of the pages on the website remain the copyrights statement of my company 'Diamond Network Ltd Co. All Rights Reserved', from which you can easily find the plagiarizing. You may also find proof via archive.org to see pages of youabc.com's old versions.

I would ask that the entire site hotel.roadtripchina.net deleted immediately from your all search engine, English version and Chinese version.

hotel.roadtripchina.net contact email: kingshao66@126.com

My contact information: Flora Niu
dmca@youabc.com
Youabc.com - Xi'an Diamond Network Co. Ltd.
Suite 508, Yu Yuan Mansion
No.65 Nan Er Huan Xi Duan
Xi'an. Shaanxi, 710068, P.R.C.

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the infringing web page is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.
